name: XCTestExpectation
desc: An expected outcome in an asynchronous test.

items.name: init(description: String)
items.desc: Creates a new XCTestExpectation with the provided description.

items.name: var expectationDescription: String
items.desc: A human readable string used to describe the expectation in log output and test reports.

items.name: func fulfill()
items.desc: Marks the expectation as having been met.

items.name: var expectedFulfillmentCount: Int
items.desc: The number of times fulfill() must be called before the expectation is completely fulfilled.

items.name: var assertForOverFulfill: Bool
items.desc: Indicates that an assertion should be triggered during testing if the expectation is over-fulfilled.

items.name: var isInverted: Bool
items.desc: Indicates that the expectation is not intended to happen.
